reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and flattering, particularly noting how the ruching accentuates curves without highlighting flaws, and one customer mentions it's classy enough for upscale restaurants.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit like a glove & Comfortable
items.body: I purchased this dress to wear to a wedding. This dress was soooo comfortable and also fit so close it made me feel like I didn't need on a support garment. Material was not thin and cheap like so many other of the new affordable dresses usually are. It fit me so well I am looking to purchase one in another color. It fit my plus size curves just right. I felt & looked good! I initially had concerns about the size. So I ordered the 3xl early in case I would need to go up a size. But it has lots of stretch so I didn't need to go up to the 4. The 3 fit great. I'm 5'5 & almost 300lbs, with the bulk of my weight being in the butt & thighs area. I also have chunky arms & a "fupa", but this dress held it all together nicely. Once I added the support garment underneath, that was the cherry on top. Read more
items.author: Trichelle_TheCakeLady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really amazing looking!
items.body: This dress looks incredible on ! The ruching is perfectly placed, very effective at hiding any unwanted lines ( think lower belly lines....). Fits a bit shorter than the girl in the photo, but I am 5'8 and extremely long in the torso, so take that into consideration. Neckline is sexy without being too low, arms are fitted without being crazy tight. Absolutely gorgeous. I'm thrilled to have found this in time for holidays Read more
items.author: Momon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress, good for curvy women
items.body: The dress looked super good! It hugs your curves and has pretty decent velvet. Runs a little small so possibly size up if you got those curves :) Read more
items.author: Cool_Coffee_Derp

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, fit true to size.
items.body: Great fit and quality. True to size, I am 6ft for height reference. Read more
items.author: Whitney W.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Beautiful color, fits well around the waist and butt. A bit loose up top. Very comfortable, easy to move in. Read more
items.author: KatiaD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cute for curvy ladies
items.body: This dress was IT for me. I chose the beautiful royal blue and it was giving ready for the party vibes. True to size and more perfect when wearing a body shaper. Read more
items.author: I R Watkins

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Long Sleeve Velvet Bodycon Dresses
items.body: The TINSTREE Women’s Plus Size Long Sleeve Velvet Bodycon Dress is absolutely gorgeous. The velvet fabric is soft, rich, and very flattering, and the ruched wrap style with the deep V neckline gives it a sexy, elegant look. It’s perfect for a night out or a special occasion. That said, this dress definitely RUNS SMALL. I recommend sizing up, especially if you want a more comfortable fit or have curves in the bust or hips. Once you get the right size, it looks amazing on. Overall, it’s a stunning dress—just be mindful of the sizing when ordering. Read more
items.author: Rosalyn Sheree Hardrick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really pretty and comfortable dress
items.body: Used this dress for multiple events. It holds up well after being washed a few times. The material is soft and stretchy and it’s on the thicker side. I truly have no complaints about this dress. Read more
items.author: Amyri Davis

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Ruched V Neck Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Ruched V Neck Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Wine Red, Purple, Dark Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
